articles.title: Super Bowl Halftime Headliner Is Revealed - Newser
articles.description: The Weeknd will do the honors in Tampa in February
articles.content:
(Newser)

articles.title: You could win a pink Cracker Barrel rocking chair signed by Dolly Parton - WVLT
articles.description: Cracker Barrel and Dolly Parton have teamed up for a special VIP package contest in light of her appearance in the Macy’s Thanksgiving Parade.

articles.title: 'I Am Greta' chronicles the birth of Greta Thunberg's climate crusade - CNN
